FOUNDRYAI.Title: FoundryAI
FOUNDRYAI.Description: AI-powered DM Assistant for Foundry VTT

Settings.MenuHint: Configure your API key, models, and RAG knowledge base.
Settings.ApiKeyHint: Your OpenRouter API key for accessing AI models. Get one at openrouter.ai
Settings.ChatModelHint: The AI model to use for chat conversations.
Settings.EmbeddingModelHint: The model used for generating text embeddings (RAG).
Settings.JournalFoldersHint: Select which journal folders to include in the AI's knowledge base.
Settings.ActorFoldersHint: Select which actor folders the AI can access for character information.
Settings.ChatHistoryFolderHint: The journal folder where raw chat sessions are saved.
Settings.SessionRecapFolderHint: The journal folder where AI-generated session recaps are saved.
Settings.TemperatureHint: Controls randomness: 0 = deterministic, 2 = very creative. Default: 0.8
Settings.MaxTokensHint: Maximum number of tokens in the AI's response. Default: 4096
Settings.SystemPromptHint: Override the default DM assistant system prompt. Leave blank to use the built-in prompt.
Settings.StreamResponsesHint: Show AI responses as they are generated (real-time streaming).
Settings.AutoIndexHint: Automatically index selected folders when Foundry loads.
Settings.EnableToolsHint: Allow the AI to search journals, create entries, and interact with the world.
Settings.ShowSidebarTabHint: Add a FoundryAI tab to the sidebar.
Settings.ImageModelHint: The model used for AI image generation (e.g. openai/dall-e-3).
Settings.TTSModelHint: The model used for text-to-speech audio generation.
Settings.MacroFoldersHint: Select which macro folders the AI can access and execute.
Settings.EnableActorToolsHint: Allow the AI to create, update, and delete actors.
Settings.EnableItemToolsHint: Allow the AI to create, update, and delete world items.
Settings.EnableMacroToolsHint: Allow the AI to list, create, update, and execute macros.
Settings.EnableImageToolsHint: Allow the AI to generate images and create scenes with AI maps.
